components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: Delay in Availability of Voice Insights Data

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery with the availability of voice insight data. Our engineers will continue to monitor the issue to assure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours, or as soon as new information becomes available.

Our engineers have identified the issue and are still working on reducing the delays in availability of voice insights data. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers have identified the issue and are working on reducing the delays in availability of voice insights data. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are currently investigating delays in availability of voice insights data for calls that ended after 9:00 PT. Our engineering team is actively working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Voice Insights. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Telefonica Network in El Salvador

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Telefonica Network in El Salvador. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with SMS Delivery Delays when sending messages to Telefonica Network in El Salvador. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Banglalink Network in Bangladesh

incident_updates.body: We continue experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Banglalink Network in Bangladesh. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We continue experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Banglalink Network in Bangladesh. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incident_updates.body: We are still investigating data delays for Twilio Rest API, impacting Twilio Calls. Customers may experience delays in data populating since 7:39 AM PT. Our engineering team is actively working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still investigating data delays for Twilio Rest API, impacting Twilio Calls. Customers may experience delays in data populating since 7:39 AM PT. Our engineering team is actively working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue investigating delays and timeout errors for Twilio Rest API, impacting Twilio Calls. Customers may experience delay in data for around 30 minutes and 404 responses. Our engineering team is actively working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are currently investigating delays and timeout errors for Twilio Rest API, impacting Twilio Calls. Customers may experience delay in data for around 30 minutes and 404 responses. Our engineering team is actively working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with calls. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incident_updates.body: The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 29 November 2022 at 18:00 PST until 29 November 2022 at 20:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 30 November 2022 at 13:00 PDT until 30 November 2022 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Tele2 Russia handsets.

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 30 November 2022 at 13:00 PST until 30 November 2022 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

Our Voice carrier partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 01 December 2022 at 02:30 PST until 01 December 2022 at 03:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be call drops to and from subset of Twilio Australia and New Zealand phone numbers.

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 01 December 2022 at 14:00 PST until 01 December 2022 at 20:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - Small US Carriers

incident_updates.body: A subset of small carriers in the US is conducting an emergency maintenance from 01 December 2022 at 21:00 PST until 02 December 2022 at 03:00 PST . During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from small US Carriers

incident_updates.body: The StarHub network in Singapore is conducting a planned maintenance from 03 December 2022 at 09:00 PST until 03 December 2022 at 15:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from StarHub Singapore handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Japan SMS Carrier Maintenance - Rakuten Mobile

incident_updates.body: The Rakuten Mobile network in Japan is conducting an emergency maintenance from 5 December 2022 at 05:00 PDT until 5 December 2022 at 12:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Rakuten Mobile Japan handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: UK SMS Carrier Maintenance - Stour Marine

incident_updates.body: The Stour Marine network in the UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 05 December 2022 at 15:00 PST until 05 December 2022 at 18:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Stour Marine UK handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US and Canada SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in the US and Canada will be conducting planned maintenance from 07 December 2022 at 20:00 PDT until 08 December 2022 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from both US and Canada handsets via Toll-free numbers

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Planned Maintenance for Flex Insights Historical Reporting

incident_updates.body: The Flex Insights Historical Reporting dashboards visualisation partner in the US is conducting a planned maintenance on Saturday, December 10th, 2022, at 1:00 AM Pacific Standard Time. The maintenance window is planned to take up to 2 hours 30 minutes. During the maintenance window Flex Insights Historical Reporting access will be unavailable.

Twilio is conducting a planned maintenance beginning 29 Nov 2022 at 10:00 PST until 02 Dec 2022 at 22:00 PST.
